title: Chvrches Offer Hymns From the Altar of ’80s New Wave at SummerStage
text:
Published By: NYTimes Arts - Today 
This Scottish band, touring behind its new album, “Every Open Eye (Glassnote), was accompanied by a neon light show suited to the synthesi...
